patthana17.25:1.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.25:2.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana17.25:3.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
